p:
Calculated vibrational heat capacity at constant volume for temperatures below the melting point T < 500 K for the γ-Ag 4Li 9 disordered phase that was optimized using DFT. The melting point is not known with precision. Two columns with the data: T(K), and Cv(J.K −1mol −1) included.
6
- Ag4Li9-gamma-disordered-calculated-alpha.txt
